personal.name: Isreal Adenekan
personal.title: DevOps/Cloud Engineer
personal.tagline: Building resilient, secure, and scalable cloud environments
personal.description: DevOps/Cloud Engineer with hands-on experience automating cloud-native infrastructure using Terraform, GitHub Actions, Docker, and Kubernetes. Proven ability to implement CI/CD pipelines, Infrastructure as Code (IaC), and GitOps practices across AWS and Azure.

projects.title: Terraform AWS VPC Infrastructure Module
projects.description: Built a production-grade reusable Terraform module for AWS networking (VPC, subnets, gateways); enabled scalable and secure multi-tier infrastructure.

projects.title: Flask App CI/CD with GitHub Actions
projects.description: Automated Docker build, test, and deployment pipeline using GitHub Actions; reduced deployment cycle time by 50%.

projects.title: Microservices E-commerce Platform
projects.description: Implemented CI/CD, Docker Compose, and centralized logging with EFK; improved deployment consistency and reduced manual errors.

projects.title: Kubernetes Cluster Observability
projects.description: Deployed Prometheus, Grafana, Loki, and Jaeger on Kubernetes; enabled real-time metrics, traces, and alerting for microservices observability.

experience.title: DevOps/Cloud Engineer
responsibilities: Provisioned multi-cloud infrastructure using Terraform and Ansible, reducing setup time by 40%
Implemented GitOps-driven CI/CD pipelines with GitHub Actions and ArgoCD
Deployed containerized microservices on Kubernetes using Helm
Integrated observability tools improving incident response time by 55%

experience.title: DevOps Engineer (Intern)
responsibilities: Built and deployed real-world infrastructure scenarios on AWS using Terraform and Ansible
Developed CI/CD pipelines with GitHub Actions improving delivery speed by 50%
Containerized multi-service applications with Docker and Kubernetes
Configured observability stack for monitoring service metrics and logs

experience.title: Technical Support Engineer
responsibilities: Delivered Tier 2 technical support for Microsoft 365 and Windows users
Maintained 95%+ issue resolution across diverse customer environments
Recognized with 3x 'Quality Hero' awards for exceeding performance KPIs

achievements.title: Quality Hero Award (3x)
achievements.description: Recognized three times for consistently exceeding performance and customer satisfaction KPIs in technical support

achievements.title: 95%+ Issue Resolution Rate
achievements.description: Maintained exceptional issue resolution rate across diverse customer environments

achievements.title: 50% Deployment Time Reduction
achievements.description: Achieved significant improvement in delivery speed through automated CI/CD pipeline implementation

achievements.title: 60% Production Error Reduction
achievements.description: Implemented GitOps-driven CI/CD pipelines reducing production errors across 3 environments

achievements.title: DevOps Engineering Certification
achievements.description: Successfully completed comprehensive DevOps engineering program with hands-on cloud infrastructure projects

achievements.title: 30+ Knowledge Base Articles
achievements.description: Documented reusable solutions improving support workflows and team efficiency

testimonials.name: Sarah Johnson
testimonials.text: Isreal's expertise in cloud infrastructure and automation is exceptional. His implementation of our CI/CD pipeline reduced deployment time by 50% and significantly improved our system reliability.

testimonials.name: Michael Chen
testimonials.text: Working with Isreal on our Kubernetes migration was a game-changer. His deep understanding of container orchestration and monitoring helped us achieve 99.9% uptime.

testimonials.name: Emily Rodriguez
testimonials.text: Isreal's ability to explain complex technical concepts in simple terms made our collaboration seamless. His infrastructure automation saved us months of manual work.

testimonials.name: David Wilson
testimonials.text: The monitoring and observability stack Isreal implemented gave us unprecedented visibility into our systems. His expertise in Prometheus and Grafana is outstanding.

testimonials.name: Lisa Thompson
testimonials.text: Isreal's technical support background shines through in his approach to DevOps. He not only builds robust systems but ensures they're maintainable and well-documented.
